explains: adj. 结盟的，联盟的；同盟国的；类似的；共存的；有关联的
v. 与……结盟，联合（ally 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: Allied troops captured over 300 enemy soldiers.
sentences.cn: 盟军俘虏了300多名敌方士兵。

sentences.en: MacArthur was Supreme Commander for the allied powers in the Pacific.
sentences.cn: 麦克阿瑟是太平洋盟军的最高司令官。

sentences.en: It was clear that one massive Allied offensive would overwhelm the weakened enemy.
sentences.cn: 显然同盟国一次大规模的进攻就会彻底击败已被削弱的敌军。
